mapper.sql: STAGE_ONEFORM_ID stageOneformId, PAR_STAGE_ID parStageId, ONEFORM_ID oneformId, LINK_NAME linkName, SORT_NO sortNo, IS_ACTIVE isActive, CREATER creater, CREATE_TIME createTime, MODIFIER modifier, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime
mapper.select: select apso.STAGE_ONEFORM_ID stageOneformId, apo.ONEFORM_NAME oneformName, apso.LINK_NAME linkName from aea_par_stage_oneform apso left join aea_oneform apo on apso.ONEFORM_ID = apo.ONEFORM_ID where apso.PAR_STAGE_ID = #{parStageId} order by apso.SORT_NO asc

select apsi.STAGE_ITEM_ID stageItemId, apsi.ITEM_ID itemId, apsi.ITEM_VER_ID itemVerId, apsi.STAGE_ID stageId, apsi.SUB_FORM_ID subFormId, apsi.SORT_NO sortNo, item.ITEM_NAME as itemName, item.ITEM_CODE as itemCode, item.DUE_NUM as dueNum, item.BJ_TYPE as bjType, item.IS_CATALOG as isCatalog, item.GUIDE_ORG_NAME as guideOrgName, item.ORG_NAME as orgName from AEA_PAR_STAGE_ITEM apsi,( select ai.ITEM_ID, ai.ITEM_VER_ID, ai.ITEM_NAME, ai.ITEM_CODE, ai.DUE_NUM, ai.BJ_TYPE, ai.IS_CATALOG, ai.GUIDE_ORG_NAME, org.ORG_NAME from AEA_ITEM_BASIC ai join AEA_ITEM_VER aiv on ( ai.item_ver_id = aiv.item_ver_id and ai.ITEM_ID = aiv.ITEM_ID ) left join opu_om_org org on ( ai.org_id = org.org_id and org.ORG_DELETED = '0' ) where ai.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and aiv.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and aiv.IS_DELETED = '0' )item
and apsi.ITEM_ID = item.ITEM_ID and apsi.ITEM_VER_ID = item.ITEM_VER_ID and apsi.STAGE_ID = #{parStageId} and apsi.IS_OPTION_ITEM ='0'
order by apsi.SORT_NO asc, apsi.CREATE_TIME asc
mapper.insert: insert into AEA_PAR_STAGE_ONEFORM ( STAGE_ONEFORM_ID, PAR_STAGE_ID, ONEFORM_ID, LINK_NAME, SORT_NO, IS_ACTIVE, CREATER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME ) values ( #{stageOneformId}, #{parStageId}, #{oneformId}, #{linkName}, #{sortNo}, #{isActive}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{modifier}, #{modifyTime} )
mapper.update:
update AEA_PAR_STAGE_ONEFORM
PAR_STAGE_ID = #{parStageId},
ONEFORM_ID = #{oneformId},
LINK_NAME = #{linkName},
SORT_NO = #{sortNo},
IS_ACTIVE = #{isActive},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
where STAGE_ONEFORM_ID = #{stageOneformId}
mapper.select:
select asf.FORM_ID formId, asf.FORM_ORG_ID formOrgId, asf.FORM_PROPERTY formProperty, asf.FORM_CODE formCode, asf.FORM_NAME formName, asf.IS_INNER_FORM isInnerForm from ACT_STO_FORM asf
and asf.FORM_ORG_ID = #{formOrgId} and asf.FORM_ID not in ( select DISTINCT apsi.SUB_FORM_ID from AEA_PAR_STAGE_ITEM apsi where apsi.STAGE_ID = #{stageId} and apsi.SUB_FORM_ID is not null and apsi.SUB_FORM_ID !='' ) AND asf.IS_DELETED = '0' AND asf.FORM_PROPERTY IN ( 'smart-biz', 'smart-flow' )
and ( asf.FORM_NAME like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) or asf.FORM_CODE like concat('%',concat(#{keyword},'%')) )
order by asf.CREATE_TIME desc
